Text.Language: V/etau,af qen pim~hau eke~qomqem n~q~r/i n~q/ten n~]couri n~te v~mou: cw] m~mon ouoh nai nan.
who was placed in the tomb, destroy for us the thorn of death. Save us and have mercy on us.
